channel.title: Compiling Problem
channel.description:
Maybe some of you get this error as well and have a way to fix it.
I was working on my client and was setting things up, when I clicked on compile I get this message:
[img]http://img19.picoodle.com/img/img19/3/2/4/f_Problemom_a75e94c.png[/img]
Here I also quickly took a screenie of my Run.bat file, which cuts out very quickly:
[img]http://img02.picoodle.com/img/img02/3/2/4/f_Problemo2m_bd29c69.png[/img]
This error shows up for everything now, including my server's RUN & COMPILE batch files. Anyone have an answer to this. I have made sure that it has the correct path, I have the file its looking for, the variables seem all correct. This was working perfectly up untill now. I have made plenty of servers in the past but none have came up with an error such as this.
Thanks,
Kayos

item.title: Compiling Problem
item.dc:creator: @Kayos Kayos
item.description:
@Kayos wrote:

Java JDK 1.6.0_12
Java JRE 1.6.0_07

Everything is correct, when I try doing it with another server, it says I do not have the correct java files, which I know I do. I even reinstalled. Everything is correct.

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java

All paths and variables are correct.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling Problem
item.dc:creator: @guardiansg9 guardiansg9
item.description:
@guardiansg9 wrote:

Are you sure u set up ur environmental variables right, and do you even have JDK???

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling Problem
item.dc:creator: @Ryanz Ryanz
item.description:
@Ryanz wrote:

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_XX\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

XX goes your java update.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling Problem
item.dc:creator: @Kayos Kayos
item.description:
@Kayos wrote:

Tried a million, and mine was working for a long time untill now, but Ill give it a shot.

Kayos[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 04, 2009, 12:13:49 pm[/size][hr]Bump

item.title: Compiling Problem
item.dc:creator: @1_Pk3r_1 1 Pk3r 1
item.description:
@1_Pk3r_1 wrote:

Here, try my Compiler:

@echo off
title 3p1cScap3 Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Read full topic
